channel.title: Tool migration/import on Taiga Resources
channel.description: Recent content in Tool migration/import on Taiga Resources

item.title: Jira Importer
item.description: You can migrate from Jira to Taiga as your primary project management platform following these instructions carefully.

item.title: Trello Importer
item.description: You can migrate from Trello to Taiga as your primary project management platform following these instructions carefully.

item.title: Asana Importer
item.description: You can migrate from Asana to Taiga as your primary project management platform following these instructions carefully.

item.title: Github Importer
item.description: You can migrate/sync from Github to Taiga as your primary project management platform following these instructions carefully.

item.title: Import/Export Taiga Projects
item.description: Taiga import/export feature allows you to extract all your data from one Taiga instance and move it to another one.
